title: Poland
description: This is not a standalone book. Please start with book one and enjoy the ride. This is book twenty-seven of an eighty part series.  Morgan takes some time off to go to Paris before heading off to her next client. Paris holds a few surprises for the young woman, when two unexpected guests show up and compete for her attention. When the smoke clears, she heads off to Warsaw, Germany, and meets a client that reminds her of someone she knows.   ****Special Note to readers***** Morgan is a high-end call girl. Her clients are gorgeous, wealthy and they know how to please a woman. This contains hot, super hot, boiling lava hot, scenes!  Here's what's not going to happen: They gazed at each other longingly, desire filling them to the core. She blushed and offered her hand to his. With her head hung low, the two retreated to the bedroom for some adult time.  Here's what will happen: Oh, just kidding, I can't write that here! What are you waiting for??? Click the button and follow Morgan as she goes around the world in 80 men.  This is a novella with a word count over 35,000.
author: Rebecca Ratliff
